drop_columns peripheral method#

turbine_design.turbine_design.drop_columns(df, variables, output_key)#

Drops all comumns not in ‘variables’, but retains ‘output_key’.

Args:

df (Pandas DataFrame): DataFrame from which columns will be dropped variables (list[str]): List of variables to retain as headers in dataframe. output_key (str): Name of output key (another header to be retained)

Returns:

Pandas DataFrame: Pandas DataFrame with appropriate columns removed
